about.title: Hi, I'm Richardnak Uch
about.description: Web developer with a love for sleek web design.

skill.react_desc: ReactJS is a JavaScript framework for building fast and interactive user interfaces for websites and web apps. It is one of the most widely used JavaScript frameworks
skill.react_exp: 1+ year of experience building components for websites.
skill.vue_desc: Vue.js is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. The core library is focused on the view layer only, making it easy to integrate with other libraries or existing projects.
skill.vue_exp: 3+ years of experience creating websites with easy-to-use components
skill.javascript_desc: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language. It allows you to implement complex features on web pages and is an essential part of web applications.
skill.typescript_desc: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript. It adds static types to JavaScript, helping to catch errors early and make JavaScript development more efficient.
skill.typescript_exp: 1+ year of adding types to variables
skill.tailwind_desc: TailwindCSS is a CSS framework packed with classes that can be used to build any design. It provides low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs.
skill.tailwind_exp: 1+ year of using low-level utility classes
skill.daisy_desc: DaisyUI is a plugin for Tailwind CSS that adds semantic class names and component classes. It provides ready-to-use components built with Tailwind CSS.
skill.HTML_desc: HTML5 is the latest version of the HTML standard. It includes new elements and attributes that reflect typical usage on modern websites.
skill.node_desc: Node.js is an open-source, back-end JavaScript runtime environment. It lets you use JavaScript code outside a web browser for backend development
skill.API_desc: A RESTful API is a way for websites and servers to communicate with each other. RESTful applications use HTTP requests to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on resources.
skill.firebase_desc: Firebase is a platform that helps developers build apps without needing to manage servers. It provides tools for things like real-time database, authentication services, hosting, cloud functions and push notifications.

project_1.title: Discord Bot
project_1.description: This is a Discord Bot that will perform certain predefined actions upon receiving commands from users.
